We indentified 3 different types or leve: Hemos identificado 3 tipos o niveles de estado.
Reserved for data that we want to fetch: Reserved for data that we want to fetch as little as possible. e.g.: authenticated user's data, app theme, etc.
Available only to a selected branch of t: Available only to a selected branch of the app's tree and positioned on the upper common node to all served child nodes.
This pattern should be avoided for data: Este patrón se debe evitar para datos que actualicen con demasiada frecuencia.
The <i>state</i> is the business-related: Estado son los datos relacionados al negocio.

<strong>Note:</strong> there is no hard: Nota: No hay un límite claro entre el uso de prop drilling y pasar a usar Context, en este punto cada desarrollador/a deberá usar su propio criterio.
